Description:
Detects binaries that use the same name as legitimate sysinternals tools to evade detection

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Binary Impersonating Sysinternals Tools
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\accesschk.exe' or process_path like '%\accesschk64.exe' or process_path like '%\AccessEnum.exe' or process_path like '%\ADExplorer.exe' or process_path like '%\ADExplorer64.exe' or process_path like '%\ADInsight.exe' or process_path like '%\ADInsight64.exe' or process_path like '%\adrestore.exe' or process_path like '%\adrestore64.exe' or process_path like '%\Autologon.exe' or process_path like '%\Autologon64.exe' or process_path like '%\Autoruns.exe' or process_path like '%\Autoruns64.exe' or process_path like '%\autorunsc.exe' or process_path like '%\autorunsc64.exe' or process_path like '%\Bginfo.exe' or process_path like '%\Bginfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\Cacheset.exe' or process_path like '%\Cacheset64.exe' or process_path like '%\Clockres.exe' or process_path like '%\Clockres64.exe' or process_path like '%\Contig.exe' or process_path like '%\Contig64.exe' or process_path like '%\Coreinfo.exe' or process_path like '%\Coreinfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\CPUSTRES.EXE' or process_path like '%\CPUSTRES64.EXE' or process_path like '%\ctrl2cap.exe' or process_path like '%\Dbgview.exe' or process_path like '%\dbgview64.exe' or process_path like '%\Desktops.exe' or process_path like '%\Desktops64.exe' or process_path like '%\disk2vhd.exe' or process_path like '%\disk2vhd64.exe' or process_path like '%\diskext.exe' or process_path like '%\diskext64.exe' or process_path like '%\Diskmon.exe' or process_path like '%\Diskmon64.exe' or process_path like '%\DiskView.exe' or process_path like '%\DiskView64.exe' or process_path like '%\du.exe' or process_path like '%\du64.exe' or process_path like '%\efsdump.exe' or process_path like '%\FindLinks.exe' or process_path like '%\FindLinks64.exe' or process_path like '%\handle.exe' or process_path like '%\handle64.exe' or process_path like '%\hex2dec.exe' or process_path like '%\hex2dec64.exe' or process_path like '%\junction.exe' or process_path like '%\junction64.exe' or process_path like '%\ldmdump.exe' or process_path like '%\listdlls.exe' or process_path like '%\listdlls64.exe' or process_path like '%\livekd.exe' or process_path like '%\livekd64.exe' or process_path like '%\loadOrd.exe' or process_path like '%\loadOrd64.exe' or process_path like '%\loadOrdC.exe' or process_path like '%\loadOrdC64.exe' or process_path like '%\logonsessions.exe' or process_path like '%\logonsessions64.exe' or process_path like '%\movefile.exe' or process_path like '%\movefile64.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfault.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfault64.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfaultc.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfaultc64.exe' or process_path like '%
tfsinfo.exe' or process_path like '%
tfsinfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\pendmoves.exe' or process_path like '%\pendmoves64.exe' or process_path like '%\pipelist.exe' or process_path like '%\pipelist64.exe' or process_path like '%\portmon.exe' or process_path like '%\procdump.exe' or process_path like '%\procdump64.exe' or process_path like '%\procexp.exe' or process_path like '%\procexp64.exe' or process_path like '%\Procmon.exe' or process_path like '%\Procmon64.exe' or process_path like '%\psExec.exe' or process_path like '%\psExec64.exe' or process_path like '%\psfile.exe' or process_path like '%\psfile64.exe' or process_path like '%\psGetsid.exe' or process_path like '%\psGetsid64.exe' or process_path like '%\psInfo.exe' or process_path like '%\psInfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\pskill.exe' or process_path like '%\pskill64.exe' or process_path like '%\pslist.exe' or process_path like '%\pslist64.exe' or process_path like '%\psLoggedon.exe' or process_path like '%\psLoggedon64.exe' or process_path like '%\psloglist.exe' or process_path like '%\psloglist64.exe' or process_path like '%\pspasswd.exe' or process_path like '%\pspasswd64.exe' or process_path like '%\psping.exe' or process_path like '%\psping64.exe' or process_path like '%\psService.exe' or process_path like '%\psService64.exe' or process_path like '%\psshutdown.exe' or process_path like '%\psshutdown64.exe' or process_path like '%\pssuspend.exe' or process_path like '%\pssuspend64.exe' or process_path like '%\RAMMap.exe' or process_path like '%\RDCMan.exe' or process_path like '%\RegDelNull.exe' or process_path like '%\RegDelNull64.exe' or process_path like '%egjump.exe' or process_path like '%u.exe' or process_path like '%u64.exe' or process_path like '%\sdelete.exe' or process_path like '%\sdelete64.exe' or process_path like '%\ShareEnum.exe' or process_path like '%\ShareEnum64.exe' or process_path like '%\shellRunas.exe' or process_path like '%\sigcheck.exe' or process_path like '%\sigcheck64.exe' or process_path like '%\streams.exe' or process_path like '%\streams64.exe' or process_path like '%\strings.exe' or process_path like '%\strings64.exe' or process_path like '%\sync.exe' or process_path like '%\sync64.exe' or process_path like '%\Sysmon.exe' or process_path like '%\Sysmon64.exe' or process_path like '%	cpvcon.exe' or process_path like '%	cpvcon64.exe' or process_path like '%	cpview.exe' or process_path like '%	cpview64.exe' or process_path like '%\Testlimit.exe' or process_path like '%\Testlimit64.exe' or process_path like '%\vmmap.exe' or process_path like '%\vmmap64.exe' or process_path like '%\Volumeid.exe' or process_path like '%\Volumeid64.exe' or process_path like '%\whois.exe' or process_path like '%\whois64.exe' or process_path like '%\Winobj.exe' or process_path like '%\Winobj64.exe' or process_path like '%\ZoomIt.exe' or process_path like '%\ZoomIt64.exe') and  not ((company = 'Sysinternals - www.sysinternals.com' or company = 'Sysinternals') or company = 'null'))
